language.name: Hrvatski
Welcome to the Skyblock Classic Edition
Choose the languages in the Minecraft options menu
This island is made especially for beginners. This island is the only island not inspired by the original skyblock.
This island is the classic island that everyone knows but modernized for new versions of Minecraft. Recommended for those unfamiliar with the original skyblock.

This island is very reminiscent of the original skyblock 2.0 but modernized for new versions of Minecraft. For those who love difficult challenges and know all the tricks and technical notions of the vanilla survival mode.

The legacy version is a versions that is compatible with the latest version of the datapack. always check if the current version is compatible with the datapack, don't update the datapack if the version is incompatible or if it doesn't need to be updated. could destroy the world, always make backups.
skyblock_classic_edition.multiplayer.pop: The multiplayer is disabled, activate inside the skyblock folder here:
are old versions and may not be compatible with the current datapack: if the datapack is updated it may have compatibility problems, always update the datapack to the latest compatible version.
